text: The 2011 Canadian Wheelchair Curling Championship was held March 21-27 at the Jasper Place Curling Club in Edmonton, Alberta. Manitoba won their first Canadian Wheelchair Curling Championship, defeating Alberta in the final. ==Teams== {| class="wikitable" |- !Team !! Skip !! Third !! Second !!
